name: 2DShooter (Anahita Sabaghi)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project,

Modifications:

1) Added enemies (game objects) to table row with script

2) Made 3 levels for the game

3) Changed some UIs, such as importing additional cursors via the asset store, introducing transparency for background, adding instructions scene and text, ...
